edu.stanford.nlp.classify

Interface ClassifierFactory<L,F,C extends Classifier<L,F>>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractLinearClassifierFactory, LinearClassifierFactory, NBLinearClassifierFactory, SVMLightClassifierFactory

    public interface ClassifierFactory<L,F,C extends Classifier<L,F>>
extends java.io.Serializable
    A simple interface for training a Classifier from a Dataset of training examples.
    Author:
    Dan Klein Templatized by Sarah Spikes (sdspikes@cs.stanford.edu)
